name: Geometrical Escape
description:
Experience the exacting world of Spheres and their struggles. You have been chosen as the guardian that will free the world from the RED influence. Jump from tower to tower and damage your enemies by flying over their heads, but be careful as some enemies have shields witch will stop you from your movement and make you vulnerable to attacks. Don't linger to much on one tower or the red spheres will destroy it.

Controls:

Best played with and Xbox One controller:

Left Joystick : aim

A : Jump

Alternative controls with Keyboard:

Start: Space

Move: Arrows

Alt + F4 to Quit
